title: Authors and Citation
text: Jahn N (2023). hoaddata: Data hybrid open access journal publishing. https://subugoe.github.io/hoaddata, https://github.com/subugoe/hoaddata.
code: @Manual{,   title = {hoaddata: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing},   author = {Najko Jahn},   year = {2023},   note = {https://subugoe.github.io/hoaddata, https://github.com/subugoe/hoaddata}, }

what: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: package contains information open access uptake hybrid journals. main purpose hoaddata ship data hybrid open access monitoring dashboards, currently development SUB Göttingen support Deutsche Forschungsgemeinschaft. providing data R package, hoaddata can also used data analytics tasks R. Data cover publication period 2017 - 2022.

title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: can install hoaddata GitHub :

title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: data-raw folder contains code used generate hoaddata datasets. data obtained interfacing subugoe-collaborative scholarly data warehouse, collection big scholarly datasets hosted Google Big Query maintained SUB Göttingen. Crossref used determining publication volume articles provided CC license, affiliation data gathered OpenAlex. can find corresponding SQL code inst/sql/ folder. data package automatically build GitHub Actions. merge event main branch triggers data update calling scripts data-raw/ folder. Data changes incorporated package tracked Git. makes easy update reproduce different version data contained hoaddata.

title: Data about hybrid open access journal publishing
text: Datasets released public domain. Anyone free copy, modify, publish, use, compile, sell, distribute materials form, purpose, commercial non-commercial, means. Crossref asserts claims ownership individual items bibliographic metadata associated Digital Object Identifiers (DOIs) acquired use Crossref Free Services. Individual items bibliographic metadata associated DOIs may cached incorporated user’s content systems. OpenAlex data made available CC0 license. Transformative Agreements Public Data made available CC0 license. work re-used following dataset: Pollack, Philipp; Lindstrot, Barbara; Barbers, Irene, Stanzel, Franziska, 2021, “Open Access Monitor: Zeitschriftenlisten (V2)”, https://doi.org/10.26165/JUELICH-DATA/VTQXLM. published CC 4.0.

title: Hybrid OA publishing output from first authors — cc_articles
Hybrid OA publishing output from first authors — cc_articles
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 901480 rows 7 columns.

title: Hybrid OA publishing output from first authors — cc_articles
text: first author often considered lead author (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lead_author) usually undertaken research presented article, although author roles can vary across disciplines. used OpenAlex data source determining lead author's affiliation. case OpenAlex record country affiliation, extracted country names display_name using regular expressions. Variables: doi DOI OA article issn_l Linking ISSN cr_year Earliest publication year (Crossref field `issued`) cc Normalized Creative Commons variant. country_code country institution located, represented ISO two-letter country code. (OpenAlex field `country_code` extra country extraction) id OpenAlex ID institution display_name primary name institution (OpenAlex field `display_name`) knowledge, OpenAlex provide information corresponding  authors affiliation.

title: First author country affiliations per journal, year and Creative Commons license — jn_aff
text: Country affiliations determined using first author affiliation listed OpenAlex. first author often considered lead author(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lead_author) usually undertaken research presented article, although author roles can vary across disciplines. Note full counting every original article review counted per country affiliation first authors applied. first authors can multiple affiliations different countries, use dataset, jn_ind determine journal's publication volume. Variables: issn_l Linking ISSN cr_year Earliest publication year (Crossref field `issued`) country_code country institution located, represented ISO two-letter country code. (OpenAlex field `country_code`) cc Normalized Creative Commons variant. NA represents articles, provided CC license articles_under_cc_variant Number articles Creative Commons variant, grouped journal, year country affiliation articles_total Yearly journal output year country affiliation

what: Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — jn_ind
title: Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — jn_ind
text: dataset contains number proportion open access articles Creative Commons license (CC) license variant year hybrid journals included cOAlition S Journal Checker Tool.

title: Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — jn_ind
Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — jn_ind
text: object class tbl_df (inherits tbl, data.frame) 100644 rows 6 columns.

title: Prevalence of Creative Commons licenses by variant, year and journal — jn_ind
text: Publication period 2017 - 2022. Journal's article volume calculated using Crossref metadata snapshot. Note articles published regular issues aside supplements containing conference contributions like meeting abstracts, indicated non-numeric pagination, included. Also, non-scholarly journal content, table contents excluded. , followed Unpaywall's paratext recognition approach, expanded include patterns indicating corrections. CC licenses also identified Crossref. License information author accepted manuscripts ("aam") considered. Variables: issn_l Linking ISSN cr_year Earliest publication year (Crossref field `issued`) cc Normalized Creative Commons variant. Ordered factor license variant permissiveness cc_total Number articles Creative Commons variant jn_all Yearly journal output prop Proportion CC licensed articles

title: Hybrid Journals listed in the Open Access Monitor — oam_hybrid_jns
text: Pollack, Philipp; Lindstrot, Barbara; Barbers, Irene, Stanzel, Franziska 2022, Open Access Monitor: Zeitschriftenlisten (v2) https://doi.org/10.26165/JUELICH-DATA/VTQXLM

title: Hybrid Journals listed in the Open Access Monitor — oam_hybrid_jns
text: direct data exchange Crossref ISSN agency. Instead, publishers register journal-level metadata first deposit metadata given journal, including ISSN(s). Crossref makes sure article journal metadata match. info Crossref's handling ISSN registration can found support thread: https://community.crossref.org/t/parallel-titles---given-issn/2183 Variables: agreement Transformative agreement German consortium lead Institution leading nationwide consortium cr_journal_id Crossref journal ID issn International Standard Serial Number (ISSN), ID refer specific journal's media version
